scripts.fetchAPI: ./scripts/env_vars.sh && eval "$(./scripts/env_vars.sh)" && curl -k ${CMO_SMILE_URL}/v2/api-docs | json | grep -v basePath | grep -v termsOfService | grep -v host > packages/smile-ts-api-client/src/generated/SmileAPI-docs.json
scripts.updateAPI: yarn run fetchAPI && yarn run buildAPI
scripts.prettierFixCurrentChanges: STAGED_AND_CHANGED_FILES=$(git diff HEAD --name-only --cached --diff-filter=d) && ([ -z "$STAGED_AND_CHANGED_FILES" ] && echo "Nothing to prettify" || (yarn run prettier --write $(echo $STAGED_AND_CHANGED_FILES) && git add -f $(echo $STAGED_AND_CHANGED_FILES)))
scripts.prettierCheckCircleCI: git remote add smile-repo https://github.com/mskcc/smile-dashboard.git && git fetch smile-repo master && CHANGED_FILES=$(git diff smile-repo/master --name-only --diff-filter=d) && [ ! -z "$CHANGED_FILES" ] && yarn run prettier -c $(echo $CHANGED_FILES) && git remote remove smile-repo
scripts.prettierFixLocal: CHANGED_FILES=$(git diff master --name-only --diff-filter=d) && ([ ! -z "$CHANGED_FILES" ] && yarn run prettier --write $(echo $CHANGED_FILES) || echo "Nothing to prettify")
